message.entry: NumQuadTreeLevels must either be 'auto' or a scalar positive integer.
The boxLabels input must be a table with axis aligned bounding boxes and labels. See the documentation for more details.
The boxLabels input contains equal number of counts for each label. There is no need for balancing the box labels.
The number of bigimage objects must be equal to the height of the boxLabels table input.
The number of blockedImage objects must be equal to the height of the boxLabels table input.
The levels input must be a positive scalar integer or a B-by-1 vector, where B is the number of bigimage objects.
The levels input must be a positive scalar integer or a B-by-1 vector, where B is the number of blockedImage objects.
The Levels Name-Value pair must be specified only with blockedImages input.
Invalid number of input arguments. Expected boxLabels, blockSize, and numObservations for blockedImages input.
Balancing box labels for {0} images with {1} box labels.
Step 1 of 2: Collecting blocks from images
Step 2 of 2: Collecting balanced observations from blocks
